title:
When you power on the PC after the WiMAX Stick is connected, the Windows
OS hangs.
answer:
(1)Check the settings of devices such as the USB interface and the network adapter in the Basic Input/Output System (BIOS) of the PC. It is recommended that you enable devices such as the USB interface and the network adapter.
(2)Remove the WiMAX Stick safely and restart the PC. Then connect the WiMAX Stick to the PC again.
